en.heading: About Me
en.description: Certified Career Counselor and Developer, I help you discover your career path and develop yourself through building a practical plan that leads you toward achieving your goals and ambitions.
en.passion: My passion is to be your partner in success to transform your passion and ambition into practical steps that lead you toward a promising future.
qualifications: International certifications in career guidance and development NCDA, CCE

en.question: How do I choose the right service?
en.answer: To help choose the right service, contact via WhatsApp and describe your inquiry.

en.question: Are sessions remote or in-person?
en.answer: All sessions are delivered remotely via Google Meet. For in-person sessions please contact via WhatsApp for pricing details.

en.question: Refund Policy
en.answer: All amounts paid are non-refundable after completion of the purchase.
